sarala jiwithayak sandaha wadagath piyawara kihipayak parisarika washayen wadagath wana aakaraye sarala jiwithayak aarambha kirime di apata gatha haki wadagath ha mulika piyawara kihipayak pahatha dakwe.  apa edineda jiwath wana aakaraya aawarjanaya kara ape jiwithaya sarala karaganima sandaha kala hakke monawa da yanna sitha balima - meya palamu ha asiruthama kriyamargaya we.  awashyatha adu ha sarala karaganima sarala diwiyak wetha yomu wime di apata gatha haki mulika piyawara we.  ese handunagath piyawara atharin, warakata ekak bagin thoragena kriyathmaka kirima ma`gin eya sarthaka wa sidu kala haki we.  ape awashyatha sankirna karana ha adhiparibhojanayata polambaawana warthamana samaja ratawa therumganima ha samajaye wiwidha prawahawalata nathu no wima.  thoragath piyawara akhanda wa pawathwagena yama ha an ayata da ema paniwidaya laba dima.
